page.title: 02Entertainment in Wilton
page.content: In Wilton there is a shortage of entertainment facilities. There is no theatre and the nearest cinema is in Salisbury. The community has several amateur groups who produce entertainments using the stages at the{Michael {Herbert Hall}and at{Wilton Middle {School.}The{Wilton Arts Group}produce straight plays and musical entertainments. The{Middle School}produces an annual entertainment:"Wizard of Oz"in 1984. The{Social Club}in North Street provides a meeting place for adults. Each year a{fun fair}is held in the {Market Place in October. {Wilton House,}home of the Herbert family since the sixteenth century, is visited by thousands of people from all over the world each year.
